articles.title: JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon to be deposed in Epstein lawsuits - Financial Times

articles.content: Jamie Dimon, the longtime chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, will be interviewed under oath over his banks decision to retain the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein as a client, said people familiar w… [+3093 chars]

articles.title: AI could replace equivalent of 300 million jobs - report - BBC
articles.description: ChatGPT-style AI will have a large impact but new jobs could emerge, a Goldman Sachs report says.
articles.content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) could replace the equivalent of 300 million full-time jobs, a report by investment bank Goldman Sachs says.
It could replace a quarter of work tasks in the US and Europe… [+2864 chars]
